item.title: French Jews 'protected' by Pétain? Eric Zemmour's thesis challenged by historians
item.content:encoded: Eric Zemmour claimed that Pétainhad"protectedthe Jewsfrenchs"during the Occupation, proceeding toa "bartersiniFebruary 11, 2022here comes again with correct spelling from Raul Hillberg, adds details on the number of Jews deported from France

media:content.media:description: Marshal Pétain and German Chancellor Adolf Hitler, November 24, 1940 in Montoire-sur-le-Loir.

item.author: Julien NGUYEN DANG
Jeremy TORDJMAN
AFP France
